In the future, Cornelio wants to improve his business and increase his income so that he can provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, a flashlight and cement to renovate his house.

loans.name: Miljana

texts.en: Miljana lives in Kosovo in a Roma community with her five children, who range in age from one to nine years old. Three of them currently attend school. Miljana is divorced and earns a living by producing handicrafts which she sells. Her work is very unique, which allows her to earn a lot of money. She also works from her home, which allows her to care for her children and keep expenses down. She needs a loan to buy materials for her work. The loan will improve her working conditions and allow her to generate more income. In the future she hopes to improve her family's life and provide the best education for her children. She is very thankful to all Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: to buy materials for a handicraft business.

loans.name: Manuel Armando

texts.es: Manuel tiene 39 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia. Se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como: maíz, frijoles y maicillo. El cultivar esos granos son su principal fuente de ingresos. Ha realizado esta actividad por mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida honradamente. Él es un hombre muy responsable, honesto y dedicado en su trabajo. Es muy conocido por sus vecinos los cuales dan buenas referencias de su trabajo como de su persona. Cada año repite está actividad ya que es una persona muy humilde y de escasos recursos el cual no puede accesar a otro tipo de negocio o trabajo por carecer de mayor preparación académica. Este año al igual que los anteriores ha decidido cultivar la tierra y ya que aún es tiempo para sembrar, quiere estar preparado con los  insumos agrícolas necesarios  para cosechar los principales granos básicos. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita crédito a  INTEGRAL, ya que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios  para realizar la inversión. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de insumos agrícolas como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas,  u otros. De esta forma espera lograr cultivar los principales granos básicos de este año y así continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel, 39, lives in his own house with his family.  He makes a living growing basic grains: corn, beans, and millet.  This is his main source of income.  He has done this work for a long time and it's how he earns an honest living.  He's a very responsible and honest man who is dedicated in his job.  He's very well known among his neighbors, who give him good references for both his work and his character.

He does this job every year because he's a very humble person of few resources who doesn't have the means to do any other type of business or work because he lacks an education.  This year, as in the past, he decided to grow a crop, and because it's already time to plant, he wants to be ready with the necessary supplies to grow the main basic grains.  This is why he's requesting a loan from Integral, because he doesn't have the financial resources necessary to make the investment.

He's going to invest the loan in agricultural inputs, including seeds, fertilizer, and insecticide.  This way he hopes to grow the main basic grains of the year and continue supporting his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and other agricultural inputs

loans.name: Deyanira

texts.es:
Con un préstamo de 15,900 pesos Deyanira ha podido comprar provisiones tales como ½ saco de arroz, ½ saco de azúcar, 1 lata de aceite, leche, huevos y bebidas refrescantes para su tiendita de comida. Deyanira perdió su empleo hace 18 meses, y con el dinero que le dieron de seguro de desempleo abrió esta tienda, con la que ayuda a su esposo a sostener el hogar. Él trabaja como vendedor en una tienda de libros. Tienen 3 hijos de 17, 14 y 11 años, quienes estudian en la escuela pública del barrio.
Deyanira ha entendido que si desea mantener una clientela fija, debe mantener su negocio siempre bien surtido de provisiones frescas, por esto ha solicitado este préstamo.

Tanto ella como su esposo desean que el negocio marche bien y genere ingresos suficientes para poder apoyar a sus hijos a estudiar en la universidad.
texts.en:
A loan of 15,900 pesos allows Deyanira to purchase provisions such as half a sack of rice, half a sack of sugar, a tin of oil, milk, eggs, and soft drinks for her little grocery store. Deyanira lost her job eighteen months ago, and she used her unemployment benefits to open this store, which enables her to help her husband support their household. He works at a book store. They have three children, who are seventeen, fourteen, and eleven, and all three attend the neighborhood public school.

Deyanira has come to understand that if she wants to maintain a steady customer base, she needs to always keep her business well-stocked with fresh groceries. That is why she has requested this loan. Both her and her husband want the business to do well and generate enough income for them to help their children go to college.

loans.use: to purchase provisions such as rice, sugar, oil, milk, eggs, and soft drinks for her little grocery store.

loans.name: Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El comité Esperanza, tiene 13  miembros, donde todas trabajan con la esperanza de salir adelante y de ayudar a sus familias, son mujeres jefas de familia que ayudan a los suyos por medio de su trabajo.
Olga se dedica a la venta de joyas de todo tipo, y cuenta que está saliendo adelante gracias a su sacrificio y esfuerzo, y por medio de sus ventas ayuda a su familia. Su meta es poder seguir creciendo y así convertirse en una gran microempresaria.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de joyas de todo tipo, como ser anillos, cadenas, pulseras y demás, para poder seguir trabajando y progresando.
texts.en:
The ‘Esperanza’ [Hope] communal bank has 13 members.  All of them work with the hope of getting ahead and helping their families.  They are all women who are the head of their household, and they help their loved ones through their work.

Olga sells all types of jewelry.  She says that she is getting ahead thanks to her sacrifice and effort.  Through her sales, she helps her family.  Her goal is to be able to continue growing and to become a great small businesswoman.

She is requesting the loan to buy all types of jewelry like rings, necklaces, bracelets, and the rest.  She will do this to be able to continue working and progressing.

loans.use: to buy rings, necklaces, and bracelets, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a tractor

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is 26 years old and in a common-law relationship with her husband. Her immediate family consists of her husband and a daughter, who is still young. They reside in the suburban area of Mombasa.

Mariam intends to start a general store to sell basic home products. She anticipates achieving good results. At the moment, Mariam is requesting a loan in the amount of 30,000 KES, so that she can buy foods, medicines, soft drinks, detergents and other household items, to stock her store. She believes that the financial support she is receiving will help her to grow and move forward. This loan should help her to improve her living standard and to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy foods, medicines, soft drinks, detergents and other household items, to stock her store.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti sells seafood for a living. She is accompanied by her husband, and has three children. She started this business because her family needed an extra income. 
She currently needs to invest in her business, purchasing fresh seafood to meet customer demand. She will purchase fish and cooking oil, which will help her business be financially solvent and meet customer demand.
She expects good returns from this loan, an investment that will allow her to increase her earnings and improve her family's quality of life in the future

loans.use: purchase fish and cooking oil

loans.name: Aquilia

texts.en: Aquilia  is a 40-year-old married woman from Baclayon, Bohol. She has four children who range in age from five to 18 years old.  She earns a living by raising pigs, and has been in this line of work for four years. She earns money on the side by selling coffee. Her husband earns a living as a driver for a private company. Aquilia is requesting a loan for PHP 10,000 buy additional piglets, feed for them to eat and coffee. She would like to expand her business in order to better support her family and send her children to school so they have a bright future.

loans.use: to buy additional pigs, feed, and coffee.
